headline: SLB OneSubsea Awarded EPC Contract for Equinor’s Fram Sør Project
summary: HOUSTON, August 25, 2025--Global energy technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) announced today that its OneSubsea™ joint venture has been awarded an engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) contract by Equinor for a 12-well, all-electric Subsea Production System (SPS) in the Fram Sør field, offshore Norway.

raw.headline: SLB OneSubsea Awarded EPC Contract for Equinor’s Fram Sør Project

headline: Schlumberger (SLB): Assessing Valuation Pressures After Oil Price Drop and Earnings Forecast Cuts
summary: Schlumberger (SLB) has been getting extra attention lately as negative sentiment grips the energy sector, largely due to falling oil prices and persistent macroeconomic uncertainty. Investment funds have started calling out the company's performance as a drag on their portfolios and pointing to recent downward revisions in earnings expectations. Given the headwinds facing the entire sector right now, it is no surprise that investors are wondering if this market pressure has pushed...
